name: green piece of paper
description: You see green piece of paper.
examineText: There is a green piece of paper here.

properties.readText:
!!!! 	FROBOZZ MAGIC ROBOT COMPANY  !!!!

Hello, Master!
   
   I am a late-model robot, trained at MIT Tech to perform various
simple household functions. 

Instructions for use:
   To activate me, use the following formula:
	>TELL ROBOT '<something to do>' <cr>
   The quotation marks are required!
       
Warranty:
   No warranty is expressed or implied.
				
					At your service!

interactions.message: There is a green piece of paper here.
You take the green piece of paper.
